lacoste_blanc.name: La Coste Blanc
lacoste_blanc.subtitle: lorem dfdsfdfdf dfdfd dfdf dfd f ffdfd
lacoste_blanc.description: Experience the epitome of luxury with Clive Christian, a fragrance that captivates the senses with its rich and opulent blend. Perfect for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

extraInfo.title: Fragrance Experience
extraInfo.content: Anendos perfumes are crafted to embody charisma, confidence, and elegance. Each scent enhances your personal presence and leaves a lasting impression.

extraInfo.title: How to Use
extraInfo.content: Spritz lightly on pulse points—wrists, neck, and behind ears. Let your signature scent reveal your sophistication and confidence throughout the day.

extraInfo.title: Shipping & Delivery
extraInfo.content: Enjoy same-day delivery within Casablanca. Orders outside Casablanca are delivered within 1-2 business days. Free shipping on orders over 500 MAD.
